transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
6 APRIL 1988
The President of the Socialist Republic of Romania, His
Excellency Mr Nicolae Ceausescu, accompanied by Mrs Elena
Ceausescu, will pay a State Visit to Australia from Monday
11 April to Sunday 17 April. They will visit Canberra,
Brisbane and Perth.
The President will have discussions with Federal and State
Ministers on a range of matters, including in particular the
prospects for increasing trade between the two countries.
He will also meet mining company executives in Brisbane and
Perth. 005532 -J
4/ 4T
) 4R LI(
FOR MEDIA
